subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|好物|こうぶつ}}: favorite food
* {{ja-r|本物|ほんもの}}: real
* {{ja-r|物%語|もの%がたり}}: tale, story
* {{ja-r|食べ物|たべもの}}: food
* {{ja-r|着%物|き%もの}}: kimono
* {{ja-r|動物|どうぶつ}}: animal
* {{ja-r|果物|くだもの}}: fruit
* {{ja-r|見物|けんぶつ}}: sightseeing
* {{ja-r|贋物|がんぶつ}}: a [[fake]], an [[imitation]], a [[knock-off]]
{{der-bottom}}
